== Ubuntu Netbook Edition to Ubuntu desktop 12.04 LTS ==
Note: the Ubuntu Netbook Edition isn't anymore an official flavor. You will get transitioned to the desktop version on upgrade thus and see similar enhancements than stated above. Please note the following differences though:
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Area
| UNE 10.04
| Desktop 12.04
| Comment
|-
| Shell
| Netbook-launcher
| Unity
| Unity will replace the netbook-launcher interface
|-
| Window Manager
| metacity
| compiz 0.9
| 
|-
| Camera
| Cheese
| (none)
| Cheese still available in software-center (and will be kept on upgrade)
|}
